body: I remember reading this on a different website years ago and the end always kinda annoyed me. like, this and the others in this series are true masterpieces in every sense of the word, the art is fantastic, the character designs are fantastic, the story is fantastic, everything is PERFECT but the ending is just so dam abrupt. Like yeah it's a happy ending but like, fuck man, when ya read 4 incredible works with so much detail and care put into them you would expect a little more explanation on the ending.
